data.quote: Behind every successful man there’s a lot of unsuccessful years.
data.author: Bob Brown

data.quote: If you have no critics you’ll likely have no success.
data.author: Malcolm X

data.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
data.author: Bo Bennett

data.quote: Success is the child of audacity.
data.author: Benjamin Disraeli

data.quote: Forget the past.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: The true success is the person who invented himself.
data.author: Al Goldstein

data.quote: When the water starts boiling it is foolish to turn off the heat.
data.author: Nelson Mandela.

data.quote: Be content to act, and leave the talking to others.
data.author: Baltasar

data.quote: Without tenderness, a man is uninteresting.
data.author: Marlene Dietrich

data.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you’re helping them up.
data.author: Jesse Jackson

data.quote: The fragrance always stays in the hand that gives the rose.
data.author: Hada Bejar

data.quote: A great man shows his greatness by the way he treats little men.
data.author: Thomas Carlyle

data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing -- that's why we recommend it daily.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
data.author: Denise Brennan-Nelson

data.quote: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right.
data.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

data.quote: No nation can rise to the height of glory unless your women are side by side with you.
data.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

data.quote: Think 100 times before you take a decision, But once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man.
data.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

data.quote: Fashion has been something that I have been really into since a very long time. Every girl likes dressing up, and I am that kind of a girl who take a little time to dress up. I love to dress up at occasions.
data.author: Kriti Sanon

data.quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
data.author: edgar-allan-poe-quotes

data.quote: I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity.
data.author: edgar-allan-poe-quotes
